name: The Cube Collective
description: Co-Founded The Cube Collective, a Minecraft community, and developed Minecraft mods and plugins along with a website for the community.

name: Virtual Classroom
description: Developed a gamified virtual science classroom to aid and enhance remote learning for middle schoolers with basic physics/chemistry labs.

name: Platformer Mobile Game
description: Developed a 2D platformer game with basic movement functions for the Android operating system.

name: Multiplayer FPS Game
description: Developed a multiplayer first-person shooter game with procedural map generation, using functions based on Perlin-noise.
